SELECT CASE WHEN STATUS_001 = '001_OK' THEN '001' ELSE CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%H:%i:%s') > '09:00:00' THEN '002' ELSE '003' END END AS STATUS_001, TIME_001,
CASE WHEN STATUS_002 = '002_OK' THEN '001' ELSE CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%H:%i:%s') > '14:00:00' THEN '002' ELSE '003' END END AS STATUS_002, TIME_002, CASE WHEN STATUS_003 = '003_OK' THEN '001' ELSE CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%H:%i:%s') > '20:00:00' THEN '002' ELSE '003' END END AS STATUS_003, TIME_003, CASE WHEN STATUS_004 = '004_OK' THEN '001' ELSE CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%H:%i:%s') > '24:00:00' THEN '002' ELSE '003' END END AS STATUS_004, TIME_004
FROM ( SELECT IF(EXISTS(SELECT * FROM tb_smell_register WHERE SMELL_REGISTER_TIME = '001' AND DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_ID = #{userId}), '001_OK', '001_NO') AS STATUS_001, (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') REG_DT FROM tb_smell_register WHERE SMELL_REGISTER_TIME = '001' AND DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC LIMIT 1) AS TIME_001, IF(EXISTS(SELECT * FROM tb_smell_register WHERE SMELL_REGISTER_TIME = '002' AND DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_ID = #{userId}), '002_OK', '002_NO') AS STATUS_002, (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') REG_DT FROM tb_smell_register WHERE SMELL_REGISTER_TIME = '002' AND DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC LIMIT 1) AS TIME_002, IF(EXISTS(SELECT * FROM tb_smell_register WHERE SMELL_REGISTER_TIME = '003' AND DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_ID = #{userId}), '003_OK', '003_NO') AS STATUS_003, (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') REG_DT FROM tb_smell_register WHERE SMELL_REGISTER_TIME = '003' AND DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC LIMIT 1) AS TIME_003, IF(EXISTS(SELECT * FROM tb_smell_register WHERE SMELL_REGISTER_TIME = '004' AND DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_ID = #{userId}), '004_OK', '004_NO') AS STATUS_004, (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') REG_DT FROM tb_smell_register WHERE SMELL_REGISTER_TIME = '004' AND DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC LIMIT 1) AS TIME_004 ) AS A
